title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 225.3 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 225.3 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) A
manufacturer, distributor, or wholesaler must pay an annual registration fee of
$5,000 to the Office of Fire Prevention and Control. (b) A specialty retailer must pay an annual
registration fee of $2,500 to the Office of Fire Prevention and Control for
each location. (c) A permanent
retailer must pay an annual registration fee of $200 to the Office of Fire

Prevention and Control for each location. (d) A temporary seasonal retailer must pay a
registration fee of $250 per season to the Office of Fire Prevention and

Control for each location. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
225.3

Adopted

New

York State Register March 23, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 12, eff. 3/23/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
